Changelog for Django Auth2
==========================


0.0.10 (2016-10-07)
-------------------

- Can choice SEND_MAIL_ACTIVATION or no send


0.0.7 (2016-10-07)
------------------

- Customisation of forms under user modes


0.0.6 (2016-10-06)
------------------

- Add view activation user; can use without celery


0.0.1 (2016-10-06)
------------------

- Initial release; we are working
